üá¨üáß On these days (29th - 30th September) we remember the sad event in the history of Czechoslovakia....

Exactly 83 years ago a conference of representatives of nazi Germany (Adolf Hitler), fascist Italy (Benito Mussolini), France (Edouard Daladier) and Great Britain (Neville Chamberlain) were summoned to Munich to solve the so - called "Sudeten german question" in the areas of the czechoslovakian border region. The conference was the culmination of the previous events of a century - old dispute between Czechs and the czech Germans, who came in the middle ages to the territory, which has always been ours, as guests at the invitation of the some czech kings, but as humble guests they behaved only sometimes and only some of them. Most of them have always treated us Czechs with despect, contempt, arrogance and hatred similarly as western colonists treated the conquered nations in other parts of the world. With the establishment of free and independent Czechoslovakia a large number of them never reconciled, even though Czechoslovakia as one of the few countries with such a large german minority provided them with all the linguistic and national freedom. In the first CS republic there were thousands of german schools, german radio and the press and in the late twenties their ministers were in our government. But it was not enough for them. 

Since the beginning of the thirties in german - speaking areas began to spread nazi ideas and the result was anti - czech and anti - slavic moods spreaded mostly through the Sudeten german party, which resulted in several serious incidents, when czech families living in mostly german - speaking areas were attacked and lynched, the example is incident in little town Habartov. Czechoslovakia tried to reconcile with them, but the demands of the sudeten Germans led by the nazi Konrad Henlein (who paradoxically, despite their hatred towards the Czechs, was half Czech, because they had a czech mother) were stepping up. Nazi propaganda sent to the world false and fictional reports of alleged terror against the Germans in Czechoslovakia. The Western Powers, which were the guarantors of the establishment of our slavic state, gradually began to cling to the nazi side. In 1938 the situation was rampant  and Czechoslovakia was forced to mobilize, because of nazi military maneuvers. Germany was secretly sent to our territories members of SS, SA and Freikorps, who attacked and killed czech gendarmes and border guards. 

The Western Powers decided to send to Czechoslovakia Lord Runciman's mission to recognize, what is happening in the Czechoslovakia border areas. But he was totally incompetent and unilaterally focused, he was not interested in the situation and essentially his only activities were visits to the spectacles of sudeten german pronazi aristocrats. According to it his final report looked like. In September 1938 Hitler had at the NSDAP congress his fanatical speech full of hatred towards Czechoslovakia, which led to riots and several local uprisings in our border regions. In response to these events a conference of the aforementioned representatives was convened in Munich. The night of 29 and 30 September became the night of treachery. The Western powers, with whom we had allied treaties, to whom we looked up and in whom we hoped in our struggle for freedom and democracy, preyed us to the nazis and forced us to surrender our territory to Germany. On the following day the german military units, which was prepared before, came into the border region enthusiastically celebrated by a large part (not all) of sudeten Germans, who with the Wehrmacht, the SS and the Gestapo began to forcibly expel their czech neighbors. The victims also became german anti - fascists, who fled the from Germany because of nazis or the czech Germans, who were loyal to Czechoslovakia. There was also a refend, in which most Germans agreed to join Germany. So the dark epoch of our Homeland began, which was completed by the nazi occupation of our entire territory...

In the attached picture you can see the not very competent british Prime Minister Neville Chamberlain, who landed then at London airport after the Munich conference and waved a piece of paper over his head, where Hitler allegedly promised him peace. However, in history papers don‚Äôt matter, especially for Hitler-type people, and after a few months Chamberlain's naivety became clear.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî-
üá¨üáß On our website, we strive to promote mutual friendship between the peoples of central, eastern and south-eastern Europe, believing that it is important not only to cultivate cultural contacts, but also to help each other in difficult times ü§ù

If you follow the events of recent days, you may know that Greece and other countries in south-eastern Europe have been hit by large-scale fires, which, despite great efforts of firefighters, are constantly advancing and destroying thousands of homes along the way. A few days ago, the situation reached a critical point where the fire reached the suburbs of Athens, threatening to eventually destroy this ancient city, depriving hundreds of thousands of its inhabitants of their homes. In the end, however, a minor miracle happened when came to the aid of the enormous efforts of the greek people one of the triumphs of slavic technology, the russian airplane Beriev 200 (see the picture below), with the help of which the flames were at least partially tamed, the catastrophe averted and thus it show the world the power of friendship and solidarity between our nations, which can overcome even great dangers.

Although the Greeks are not Slavs, they have their own ancient culture and civilization, but through the Byzantine empire we have much of the culture and history in common with them, and therefore the fire of Athens would be a disaster for the Slavic world too. So we are really proud that the Slavs (specifically the Russians) got involved in the fight against the untamed element and helped the Greeks üá∑üá∫üá¨üá∑

A similar example is the mutual solidarity between Macedonia üá≤üá∞, Serbia üá∑üá∏ and Bulgaria üáßüá¨, which also help each other and cooperate in the fight against the advancing fire that changes everything that stands in its way to ashes. Although this catastrophe is a huge disaster, it has already shown that, despite the occasional animosities, our nations have a lot of humanity and kindness in themselves, which is manifested in difficult times and is stronger than everything else‚Ä¶

üá¨üáß Respect and friendship between our nations are values ‚Äã‚Äãthat we try to promote on our site as much as possible. We believe that mutual disputes, hatred and fratricidal wars have brought us nothing throughout our history, only weakened us fundamentally in relation to the rest of the world and, together with centuries of foreign occupation (german or turkish), are the cause of persistent poverty in many of our regions. The unfamous slavic rivalry has been used countless times against us by our enemies, who have pitted nations of Central and Eastern Europe against each other. Now, therefore, it is time to reject, in addition to western liberalism, domestic provincial ultranationalism and instead embark on the path of a community of nations that cooperate economically and jointly protect and develop their cultural and spiritual heritage. Today's world brings new fundamental challenges and questions that touch the very essence of human identity, and if we do not want to be swept away by an increasingly strong and decadent wave of globalism, we must confront them together. One nation alone can be easily defeated, but the whole of Central and Eastern Europe cannot. The basic questions are basically simple - ‚ÄúDo we have enough confidence to be able to create our own social and value system based on our historical heritage instead of adopting foreign cultural patterns? and "Are we confident enough to rise above feelings of mutual animosity?"; we believe so, and that is why our page is and will be at the forefront of building a collective Eastern European identity, based on a free man proud of his roots. Only together can we be strong again, divided we will we fall into insignificance and become the economic prey of Western states ...

As an inspiring image for this text, we are adding a beautiful postcard, on which we can see a slovenian, serbian and croatian child holding one flag together üá∏üáÆüá∑üá∏üá≠üá∑

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
üá¨üáß One of the bravest sons of the polish nation and the entire slavic world, whose courage and determination should be a role model for us, is undoubtedly general Stefan Pawe≈Ç Rowecki, who was one of the founders and main leaders of the polish Home army (Armija Krajowa), the main resistance movement in Poland during the Second World War which fought against the german occupiers. Its most important event was the Warsaw uprising ‚úåüèªüáµüá±

He was born in 1895 in the town of Piotrk√≥w Trybunalski. During World War I, he was drafted into the austro-hungarian army, but refused to pledge allegiance to the austrian emperor, and was therefore interned. After the war, he participated in the organization of the newly formed Polish army, where he founded the first military newspaper called "PrzeglƒÖd Wojskowy". When World War II broke out, he organized an entire armed brigade equipped with armored vehicles to defend his Homeland. After the occupation of Poland, he managed to avoid arrest and internment, settled in Warsaw and began to organize, together with other polish officers, the Home army, which gradually grew into a massive national liberation movement of more than 350,000 men and women. He was one of its respected leaders, who organized many successful sabotages and attacks on important targets of the german occupiers. In 1943, however, the last chapter of his life began to be written. His meeting with three traitors of the Polish nation - Eugeniusz Swierczewski, Ludwik Kalkstein-Stoli≈Ñski and Blanka Kaczorowska, Gestapo agents whose reporting sent many Polish patriots to their deaths, was fatal for him. On 30th June, 1943, Rowecki was arrested by the Gestapo and taken to Berlin, where he was interrogated for several months. Eventually, he was sent to the Sachsenhausen concentration camp, where between 2nd and 7th August, his life was prematurely ended by german executioners...

However, general Rowecki's legacy did not die, thousands of polish patriots lived his dream of a free Poland devoid of german genocidal tyranny, which after many struggles and adversities eventually came true üáµüá±

Eternal honor to the this hero and martyr of the Slavic world, whose patriotism and unwavering spirit should be an example and inspiration for us even today ...

üá¨üáß As in previous years, as representatives our project Slavs in pictures and poetry we placed a bouquet of lilacs at the memorial of soldiers who participated in the liberation of Czechoslovakia. This time we visited again the Military cemetery in Ol≈°any, Prague, where more than 400 soviet soldiers are buried, as well as several dozen barricaders from the Prague uprising and a also some british soldiers. We always try to imagine during this visits how it was for individual soldiers (sometimes boys in our age or younger than us), when they left their villages and their cities to go to the front, where they had to face a frightening enemy. Today, we cann‚Äôt imagine the intensity of the WW2 battles, and therefore we bow before all the brave soldiers, who fought against nazi Germany and its plans to destroy the central and eastern european nations. Whether it is the Soviets, who repulsed german troops from Moscow, Kursk or Stalingrad; Poles who, as pilots in the RAF, helped stop G√∂ring's Luftwaffe and who were not afraid to face the odds during the Warsaw Uprising; Yugoslavians, who were able to form several resistance armies, which attacked the occupiers and their minions from the Balkan mountains, or Czechoslovakians who, like the Poles, served in the RAF in the West and in the East formed an army corps, which came from Buzuluk to Prague - my bouquet of lilacs belongs to all these heroes, as well as to the British or Americans, who fought on the Western Front, in Northern Africa and in the Pacific. It is admirable, how great personal sacrifice all these often nameless heroes brought and we should not forget...

Originally, we went to the place with a few friends to make such a small individual piety, however, there was an official event at the memorial, where representatives of Russia, Belarusia, Ukraine, Armenia, Azerbaijan and Kazakhstan commemorated their fallen ones. So we joined the ongoing reverential event and finally laid a bouquet of lilacs to the central monument; then each of us chose one of the fallen soldiers to whose grave he laid a blossom of a red carnation üåπ

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
üá¨üáß One of the bravest sons of the polish nation and the entire slavic world, whose courage and determination should be a role model for us, is undoubtedly general Stefan Pawe≈Ç Rowecki, who was one of the founders and main leaders of the polish Home army (Armija Krajowa), the main resistance movement in Poland during the Second World War which fought against the german occupiers. Its most important event was the Warsaw uprising ‚úåüèªüáµüá±

He was born in 1895 in the town of Piotrk√≥w Trybunalski. During World War I, he was drafted into the austro-hungarian army, but refused to pledge allegiance to the austrian emperor, and was therefore interned. After the war, he participated in the organization of the newly formed Polish army, where he founded the first military newspaper called "PrzeglƒÖd Wojskowy". When World War II broke out, he organized an entire armed brigade equipped with armored vehicles to defend his Homeland. After the occupation of Poland, he managed to avoid arrest and internment, settled in Warsaw and began to organize, together with other polish officers, the Home army, which gradually grew into a massive national liberation movement of more than 350,000 men and women. He was one of its respected leaders, who organized many successful sabotages and attacks on important targets of the german occupiers. In 1943, however, the last chapter of his life began to be written. His meeting with three traitors of the Polish nation - Eugeniusz Swierczewski, Ludwik Kalkstein-Stoli≈Ñski and Blanka Kaczorowska, Gestapo agents whose reporting sent many Polish patriots to their deaths, was fatal for him. On 30th June, 1943, Rowecki was arrested by the Gestapo and taken to Berlin, where he was interrogated for several months. Eventually, he was sent to the Sachsenhausen concentration camp, where between 2nd and 7th August, his life was prematurely ended by german executioners...

However, general Rowecki's legacy did not die, thousands of polish patriots lived his dream of a free Poland devoid of german genocidal tyranny, which after many struggles and adversities eventually came true üáµüá±

Eternal honor to the this hero and martyr of the Slavic world, whose patriotism and unwavering spirit should be an example and inspiration for us even today ...

üá¨üáß Today and tomorrow (8th May and 9th May) in the slavic countries we commemorate the anniversary of the end of the last battles of World War 2 in Europe. We think it is important to remind the the great sacrifice of the Slavs in the fight against german nazism and to bow down to the immense courage of our grandfathers, who by their love for the Homeland, by their determination and by their will to live, have overcome a powerful enemy. So on these days let's take some time and remember the soldiers and ordinary people of all nations of the east and west, who, in this conflict, laid their lives for us and our future. If time permits, stop for a moment at a memorial and think for a moment about those, who have fallen here and at least in thoughts honor their memory, because if they were not there, we would probably not even be here ...

Love for life, which is typical for Slavs, will always overwhelm the dark teutonic cult of death and hate then represented by nazi Germany and its black order of SS...

üá¨üáß One of the bravest sons of the polish nation and the entire slavic world, whose courage and determination should be a role model for us, is undoubtedly general Stefan Pawe≈Ç Rowecki, who was one of the founders and main leaders of the polish Home army (Armija Krajowa), the main resistance movement in Poland during the Second World War which fought against the german occupiers. Its most important event was the Warsaw uprising ‚úåüèªüáµüá±

He was born in 1895 in the town of Piotrk√≥w Trybunalski. During World War I, he was drafted into the austro-hungarian army, but refused to pledge allegiance to the austrian emperor, and was therefore interned. After the war, he participated in the organization of the newly formed Polish army, where he founded the first military newspaper called "PrzeglƒÖd Wojskowy". When World War II broke out, he organized an entire armed brigade equipped with armored vehicles to defend his Homeland. After the occupation of Poland, he managed to avoid arrest and internment, settled in Warsaw and began to organize, together with other polish officers, the Home army, which gradually grew into a massive national liberation movement of more than 350,000 men and women. He was one of its respected leaders, who organized many successful sabotages and attacks on important targets of the german occupiers. In 1943, however, the last chapter of his life began to be written. His meeting with three traitors of the Polish nation - Eugeniusz Swierczewski, Ludwik Kalkstein-Stoli≈Ñski and Blanka Kaczorowska, Gestapo agents whose reporting sent many Polish patriots to their deaths, was fatal for him. On 30th June, 1943, Rowecki was arrested by the Gestapo and taken to Berlin, where he was interrogated for several months. Eventually, he was sent to the Sachsenhausen concentration camp, where between 2nd and 7th August, his life was prematurely ended by german executioners...

However, general Rowecki's legacy did not die, thousands of polish patriots lived his dream of a free Poland devoid of german genocidal tyranny, which after many struggles and adversities eventually came true üáµüá±

Eternal honor to the this hero and martyr of the Slavic world, whose patriotism and unwavering spirit should be an example and inspiration for us even today ...

üá¨üáß Vojtƒõch Preissig was an famous czech and later czechoslovak painter, graphic artist and illustrator of the first half of the 20th century, who was also a great czech patriot. He fought for his nation not only in words but also in deeds - during the First World War he joined the resistance against Austria - Hungary and his famous posters and graphics helped recruit soldiers to the Czechoslovak legions in France. When Germans destroyed Czechoslovakia in 1939, established the occupied Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia, and in Slovakia installed a collaborating fascist regime, he did not hesitate for a moment and again became actively involved in illegal anti-german resistance activities, for which he was arrested and sent to the Dachau concentration camp, where he died in 1944 ...

In the photo below you can see one of the posters he designed in 1939 for the domestic resistance on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of the founding of Czechoslovakia. There is a czechoslovak lion tearing the german flag with a swastika to pieces, while the inscription below the picture says: "The Czechoslovak republic persists, this is its emblem now!" ‚úåüèªüá®üáøüá∏üá∞

üá¨üáß Comments on the present events in the Czech republic

We are a project aimed at fostering friendship and mutual cultural cooperation between Slavic nations, and we will continue this mission despite the era of modern McCarthyism and the witch hunt that has now been unleashed in our country by liberal parties, their supporters and massmedia. We believe that what we are doing is right, and that the future of the Czech republic is in the family of ethnically, culturally and linguistically related nations of Central and Eastern Europe and not in constantly succumbing to someone who cares about us only as cheap labor, as source of billions on dividendas, as the place where they can export their schlocks and as military buffer zone. We love our country and our nation, and every day we strive to make our country a better place to live. As artists, we strive to develop an independent distinctive culture following our history and traditions as opposition to ubiquitous globalization. We are simply people who have an emotional connection to our country, and that is why we do not like the fact that our country is subordinated to foreign powers for more than half a century. Under the previous regime, we carried out orders from the Soviet union (sometimes the most diligently of all its satellites), which has now been replaced perhaps by even more diligent subjugation to the West. We have to laugh when we see the same politicians who have essentially destroyed many sectors of our industry and agriculture in the last three decades, sold half of our economy to Germany and caused the current situation where almost half of our laws are just implementing EU directives enforced to us by german and french lobbyists, as they have a lot of speeches on national sovereignty in the TV. Obviously, the old czech wisdom applies to them that a brazen forehead is better than a plow yard. However, we reject this mentality of the utilitarian servant, and despite the current atmosphere we will not be discouraged or disgusted and we will continue what we do. We have our own vision, which we believe in and which we are determined to continue working on, no matter what our opponents think. We are indifferent to their swearing and threats, which they have been sending to us in recent days, and we do not intend to waste time with them üòéüí™üèª‚úåüèªüá®üáø

üá¨üáß We thank all the footballers and sportsmen from Central and Eastern Europe who did not succumb to the enormous pressure of international sports organizations and did not kneel before initial kick-off. For those who know nothing about this gesture, kneeling during official events is such a new western liberal habit, when Europeans have to apologize for the crimes of colonialism and express support for the Black lives matter movement. In this context, we would like to remind that the nations of Central and Eastern Europe had no colonies, moreover they were almost without exception victims of colonialism, sometimes even more cruel and long-lasting than colonialism in african or asian countries. According to historians, more than 8 million Eastern Europeans were abducted into slavery by the Turks and Tatars, which is several million more than the total number of slaves imported into America. Some Slavic nations (Polabian Slavs) were completely exterminated. So we have nothing to apologize for and we have no reason to kneel, because we are the victims, not the culprits. If the West has a bad conscience because it has plundered and sometimes continues to plunder half the world (including Central and Eastern Europe), then let it kneel, but do not force us Slavs, Balts, Finno-Ugric, Romanians, Greeks, Georgians, Armenians and others to do it! As Russian Formula 1 driver Danil Kvyat said - we only kneel before God, before the Fatherland and before our national flag ‚úåüèªüí™üèª

Finally, a food for thought - it is quite clear that international sport is becoming increasingly politicized and increasingly biased and hostile towards clubs and players from Central and Eastern Europe. The systemic anti-Slavic racism is increasing there. So wouldn't it be worthwhile to establish something like our own league of Central and Eastern European nations, where everyone would be treated fairly, and where again it would be primarily a matter of healthy sports competitions of nations and not big business and politics? ‚öΩÔ∏èüèÜ

You can write your opinion in the comments below this post, we will look forward to the discussion üôÇ

üá¨üáß Comments on the present events in the Czech republic

We are a project aimed at fostering friendship and mutual cultural cooperation between Slavic nations, and we will continue this mission despite the era of modern McCarthyism and the witch hunt that has now been unleashed in our country by liberal parties, their supporters and massmedia. We believe that what we are doing is right, and that the future of the Czech republic is in the family of ethnically, culturally and linguistically related nations of Central and Eastern Europe and not in constantly succumbing to someone who cares about us only as cheap labor, as source of billions on dividendas, as the place where they can export their schlocks and as military buffer zone. We love our country and our nation, and every day we strive to make our country a better place to live. As artists, we strive to develop an independent distinctive culture following our history and traditions as opposition to ubiquitous globalization. We are simply people who have an emotional connection to our country, and that is why we do not like the fact that our country is subordinated to foreign powers for more than half a century. Under the previous regime, we carried out orders from the Soviet union (sometimes the most diligently of all its satellites), which has now been replaced perhaps by even more diligent subjugation to the West. We have to laugh when we see the same politicians who have essentially destroyed many sectors of our industry and agriculture in the last three decades, sold half of our economy to Germany and caused the current situation where almost half of our laws are just implementing EU directives enforced to us by german and french lobbyists, as they have a lot of speeches on national sovereignty in the TV. Obviously, the old czech wisdom applies to them that a brazen forehead is better than a plow yard. However, we reject this mentality of the utilitarian servant, and despite the current atmosphere we will not be discouraged or disgusted and we will continue what we do. We have our own vision, which we believe in and which we are determined to continue working on, no matter what our opponents think. We are indifferent to their swearing and threats, which they have been sending to us in recent days, and we do not intend to waste time with them üòéüí™üèª‚úåüèªüá®üáø

üá¨üáß Today is the sad anniversary of the bombing of Belgrade led by the NATO pact, at that time an ally of the organization U√áK, which in Kosovo mainly terrorized Serbs, but also Albanians, who disagreed with U√áK violent and terrorist methods. NATO invaded Serbia almost in a thousand - fold superiority (in aircraft) and without a UN mandate, which is considered a crime against peace, so in international law one of the most serious crimes a person or state can commit. The targets of bombing became in conflict with international law the civilians and were used banned weapons including cluster bombs, depleted uranium bombs and white phosphorus bombs. Thousands of tons of explosives landed on Belgrade, but also on Podgorica, Kragujevac, ƒåaƒçak and other cities in today's Serbia and Montenegro. Hospitals, schools with children, radio and television buildings, trains, refugee convoys and factories of consumer industry in strategic point of view strategically of little importance were bombed. Some rockets also hit Bulgaria, where they caused many other secondary damages...

The bombing of Yugoslavia is one example of a war crime that has not yet been punished. A crime committed by people of questionable moral profiles such as Javier Solana, Bill Clinton, Wesley Clark, Madelaine Albright, and others, who are not ashamed to bombard civilians with banned weapons for their economic interests and political careers. Hopefully, once the overall geopolitical situation in Europe and in the whole world changes, these individuals will be justly punished for what they have committed...

P.S .: We do not comment on yugoslav wars between Serbs, Croats and Bosniaks or other contemporary conflicts between slavic nations, because we consider them to be fratricidal wars. However, this was a conflict with the U√áK violent organization and there was a gross violation of international law by western powers, including the bombing of civilians by banned weapons, which must be unequivocally condemned.

Z tƒõchto d≈Øvod≈Ø pova≈æujeme tento manifest za stƒõ≈æejn√≠ text, kter√Ω by mƒõl n√°rod≈Øm st≈ôedn√≠ a v√Ωchodn√≠ Evropy pomoci uk√°zat spr√°vou cestu...
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
üá¨üáß Cultural and value war is what defines the contemporary world, including the Slavic one. We make no secret, and we have never made it secret, that we are slavic traditionalists proud of our roots, who are very critical or even negative of the contemporary West and of globalization. We consider the current development in western countries to be pathological and more than frightening. So we think that Slavs, Baltics, Finno-Ugrics, Dakoromans and other nations of the european East, should unequivocally reject western liberalism and instead create our own social and value system based on our culture and history. For these reasons, the manifesto recently issued by the famous russian stage director Konstantin Bogomolov is very close to us. He is saying: "The West has castrated itself and is rushing to hell!". We agree with him in many ways and bring some of the key ideas contained in his groundbreaking essay entitled "The Kidnapping of Europe 2.0." In this manifesto, he compared the liberal movement in the West with the totalitarian regimes of the past. According to him, Europe is in a deep ethical crisis and Russia should not follow its current values.

According to Bogomolov, a progressive society has become a new deity, to which every unhappy or supposedly insulted individual can pray for a special social status, financial funds or the establishment of quotas in all spheres of public life and at the expense of the majority. Anyone who disagrees with this will then fall victim to a powerful repressive machinery - public opinion. The position of judges, investigators and jailers was thus delegated to social networks and willing servants of the repressive apparatus - ‚Äúorderly" citizens and self-proclaimed liberal activists who are active on the internet and as medieval inquisitors skillfully use the human fear of being expelled from the human community.

"The contemporary western world takes the form of the New ethical reich, which also has its own ideology - the 'new ethics.' National socialism is the past, the future is ethical socialism. Queer socialism,‚Äù says Konstantin Bogomolov in his text. "Siemens and Volkswagen have been replaced by Google and Apple. Instead of the nazis, we have a mix of queer activists, feminist fanatics and ecopsychopaths who are just as aggressive and desire for a total reformatting of the world,‚Äù he wrote.

According to Bogomolov, the "empire of new ethics" that rules in the West today goes even further than the totalitarianisms of the 20th century. While nazism and communism restricted freedom of thought, progressives want to control human emotions.

"In nazi society, people were trained as dogs to hate each other. In the New ethical reich, they practice man for love and deny him the right to hate freely. You can't say 'I hate it', 'I don't like it', 'I'm afraid' anymore. You are forced to adapt your emotions to public opinion and social values."

How did the West get there? According to Bogomolov, after the WW2, Europe was frightened by the rages hidden inside the human heart and decided to bind the destructive energy of man. However, it destroyed the complexity of man created over the centuries by the influence of Christianity.

"They destroyed the man described by Dostoevsky: at the same time noble and poor, an angel and a devil, loving and hating, believing and doubting, contemplative and fanatical. Europe was frightened by man-animal and did not understand that the animal part is a natural and organic part of man, just like the angelic and spiritual part. Europe was not able to overcome the legacy of nazism intellectually and spiritually, so it decided to castrate a human complexity. They castrated man‚Äôs dark nature, imprison his rages forever."

According to Bogomolov, the western man is reminiscent of the hero of Kubrick's film ‚ÄúThe clockwork orange‚Äù - a young hooligan who is brainwashed during experimental therapy to rid him of aggression. The result is a wreck that can't stand listening to music or looking at a naked woman's body. When someone hits him, he licks his shoes.

"The modern West is like a criminal after chemical castration and lobotomy. This is the false smile of goodwill and general helpfulness on the face of Westerners. It is not the smile of Culture. It's a smile of degeneration."

"Russian progressives and supporters of western values ‚Äã‚Äãclaim that Russia has found itself on the tail of progress. No. Coincidentally, we are in the last wagon of a mad train rushing to the hell, where multicultural, gender-neutral devils await us. We must disconnect this wagon, cross ourselves, and begin to build our own world. Rebuild our good old Europe. The Europe we dreamed of. The Europe which they lost. A Europe of healthy people."

You can read the whole manifesto HERE üëâüèª https://novayagazeta.ru/articles/2021/02/10/89120-pohischenie-evropy-2-0

We believe that it is important to open these issues and ask a very clear question about the future political direction of central and eastern Europe. For these reasons, we consider this manifesto to be a key text that should help the peoples of central and eastern Europe to find the right way...

Z tƒõchto d≈Øvod≈Ø pova≈æujeme tento manifest za stƒõ≈æejn√≠ text, kter√Ω by mƒõl n√°rod≈Øm st≈ôedn√≠ a v√Ωchodn√≠ Evropy pomoci uk√°zat spr√°vou cestu...
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
üá¨üáß Cultural and value war is what defines the contemporary world, including the Slavic one. We make no secret, and we have never made it secret, that we are slavic traditionalists proud of our roots, who are very critical or even negative of the contemporary West and of globalization. We consider the current development in western countries to be pathological and more than frightening. So we think that Slavs, Baltics, Finno-Ugrics, Dakoromans and other nations of the european East, should unequivocally reject western liberalism and instead create our own social and value system based on our culture and history. For these reasons, the manifesto recently issued by the famous russian stage director Konstantin Bogomolov is very close to us. He is saying: "The West has castrated itself and is rushing to hell!". We agree with him in many ways and bring some of the key ideas contained in his groundbreaking essay entitled "The Kidnapping of Europe 2.0." In this manifesto, he compared the liberal movement in the West with the totalitarian regimes of the past. According to him, Europe is in a deep ethical crisis and Russia should not follow its current values.

According to Bogomolov, a progressive society has become a new deity, to which every unhappy or supposedly insulted individual can pray for a special social status, financial funds or the establishment of quotas in all spheres of public life and at the expense of the majority. Anyone who disagrees with this will then fall victim to a powerful repressive machinery - public opinion. The position of judges, investigators and jailers was thus delegated to social networks and willing servants of the repressive apparatus - ‚Äúorderly" citizens and self-proclaimed liberal activists who are active on the internet and as medieval inquisitors skillfully use the human fear of being expelled from the human community.

"The contemporary western world takes the form of the New ethical reich, which also has its own ideology - the 'new ethics.' National socialism is the past, the future is ethical socialism. Queer socialism,‚Äù says Konstantin Bogomolov in his text. "Siemens and Volkswagen have been replaced by Google and Apple. Instead of the nazis, we have a mix of queer activists, feminist fanatics and ecopsychopaths who are just as aggressive and desire for a total reformatting of the world,‚Äù he wrote.

According to Bogomolov, the "empire of new ethics" that rules in the West today goes even further than the totalitarianisms of the 20th century. While nazism and communism restricted freedom of thought, progressives want to control human emotions.

"In nazi society, people were trained as dogs to hate each other. In the New ethical reich, they practice man for love and deny him the right to hate freely. You can't say 'I hate it', 'I don't like it', 'I'm afraid' anymore. You are forced to adapt your emotions to public opinion and social values."

How did the West get there? According to Bogomolov, after the WW2, Europe was frightened by the rages hidden inside the human heart and decided to bind the destructive energy of man. However, it destroyed the complexity of man created over the centuries by the influence of Christianity.

"They destroyed the man described by Dostoevsky: at the same time noble and poor, an angel and a devil, loving and hating, believing and doubting, contemplative and fanatical. Europe was frightened by man-animal and did not understand that the animal part is a natural and organic part of man, just like the angelic and spiritual part. Europe was not able to overcome the legacy of nazism intellectually and spiritually, so it decided to castrate a human complexity. They castrated man‚Äôs dark nature, imprison his rages forever."

According to Bogomolov, the western man is reminiscent of the hero of Kubrick's film ‚ÄúThe clockwork orange‚Äù - a young hooligan who is brainwashed during experimental therapy to rid him of aggression. The result is a wreck that can't stand listening to music or looking at a naked woman's body. When someone hits him, he licks his shoes.

"The modern West is like a criminal after chemical castration and lobotomy. This is the false smile of goodwill and general helpfulness on the face of Westerners. It is not the smile of Culture. It's a smile of degeneration."

"Russian progressives and supporters of western values ‚Äã‚Äãclaim that Russia has found itself on the tail of progress. No. Coincidentally, we are in the last wagon of a mad train rushing to the hell, where multicultural, gender-neutral devils await us. We must disconnect this wagon, cross ourselves, and begin to build our own world. Rebuild our good old Europe. The Europe we dreamed of. The Europe which they lost. A Europe of healthy people."

You can read the whole manifesto HERE üëâüèª https://novayagazeta.ru/articles/2021/02/10/89120-pohischenie-evropy-2-0

We believe that it is important to open these issues and ask a very clear question about the future political direction of central and eastern Europe. For these reasons, we consider this manifesto to be a key text that should help the peoples of central and eastern Europe to find the right way...

üá¨üáß The triumph of western "democracy" - strange elections, barbed wire, cancel culture and 20,000 soldiers in the streets

So the new american president inaugurated, saying in his speech that the United States is celebrating ‚Äúthe triumph of democracy‚Äù. We just watch it in disbelief and say to ourselves that if it wasn't meant seriously, we might have laughed.

In recent years, we have witnessed something unprecedented - the West, which many people in central and eastern Europe have seen as the guarantor of freedom and democracy, is changing dramatically. Freedom of speech is gradually being lost here, and it is no longer possible to openly debate many things here without risking ostracism and social liquidation within the widespread cancel culture. The famous british comedian and human rights activist Rowan Atkinson also spoke about it (more HERE üëâüèª https://news.sky.com/story/rowan-atkinson-cancel-culture-is-like-medieval-mob-looking-for-someone-to-burn-12180007). In the last year, everything has accelerated many times over, and we have witnessed burning cities, violent riots, tearing down statues, rewriting history, beating people on the streets, all with the inaction of security forces and the direct or indirect support of liberal politicians and the media. In recent months, the overall situation has been dominated by elections with a strange course and many doubts, which, if they would take place in a similar way somewhere in central or eastern Europe, would be questioned and rejected as unfair by western politicians and the media.

The last few weeks there has been massive political purge, when people with uncomfortable opinions have began to be massively deleted from social networks, including the president himself (now the former) and technology giants based on cartel agreements have began to liquidate even smaller social networks which respect freedom of speech and do not adhere to liberal globalists. And that's not the end of it. The big heroine of the american media has became a daughter who reported her mother to take part in a demonstration in support of Donald Trump. The mother was subsequently fired from her company and became one of the thousands of other people who have been fired for political opinion in the West and who have been literally pushed out of public space. This has nothing to do with democracy and freedom of speech. The complete farce is today's inauguration, which is guarded by 20,000 soldiers who had previously been politically vetted by the FBI, and soldiers with an inappropriate political profile were not allowed. Barricades and barbed wires are stretched through the streets, and snipers on the roofs. Well, indeed ‚Äúthe triumph of democracy" ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

And what do we learn from this? Those who still look naively to the West as a "free world" should wake up from a naive dream, as the world has changed in the last 30 years. Current events in the United States and western Europe should be a warning to us; on their example we can see what would happen to our countries if liberal globalists managed to fully control them...

üá¨üáß The triumph of western "democracy" - strange elections, barbed wire, cancel culture and 20,000 soldiers in the streets

So today, the new american president inaugurated, saying in his speech that the United States is celebrating ‚Äúthe triumph of democracy‚Äù. We just watch it in disbelief and say to ourselves that if it wasn't meant seriously, we might have laughed.

In recent years, we have witnessed something unprecedented - the West, which many people in central and eastern Europe have seen as the guarantor of freedom and democracy, is changing dramatically. Freedom of speech is gradually being lost here, and it is no longer possible to openly debate many things here without risking ostracism and social liquidation within the widespread cancel culture. The famous british comedian and human rights activist Rowan Atkinson also spoke about it (more HERE üëâüèª https://news.sky.com/story/rowan-atkinson-cancel-culture-is-like-medieval-mob-looking-for-someone-to-burn-12180007). In the last year, everything has accelerated many times over, and we have witnessed burning cities, violent riots, tearing down statues, rewriting history, beating people on the streets, all with the inaction of security forces and the direct or indirect support of liberal politicians and the media. In recent months, the overall situation has been dominated by elections with a strange course and many doubts, which, if they would take place in a similar way somewhere in central or eastern Europe, would be questioned and rejected as unfair by western politicians and the media.

The last few weeks there has been massive political purge, when people with uncomfortable opinions have began to be massively deleted from social networks, including the president himself (now the former) and technology giants based on cartel agreements have began to liquidate even smaller social networks which respect freedom of speech and do not adhere to liberal globalists. And that's not the end of it. The big heroine of the american media has became a daughter who reported her mother to take part in a demonstration in support of Donald Trump. The mother was subsequently fired from her company and became one of the thousands of other people who have been fired for political opinion in the West and who have been literally pushed out of public space. This has nothing to do with democracy and freedom of speech. The complete farce is today's inauguration, which is guarded by 20,000 soldiers who had previously been politically vetted by the FBI, and soldiers with an inappropriate political profile were not allowed. Barricades and barbed wires are stretched through the streets, and snipers on the roofs. Well, indeed ‚Äúthe triumph of democracy" ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

And what do we learn from this? Those who still look naively to the West as a "free world" should wake up from a naive dream, as the world has changed in the last 30 years. Current events in the United States and western Europe should be a warning to us; on their example we can see what would happen to our countries if liberal globalists managed to fully control them...

üá¨üáß The nations of Central and Eastern Europe have two choices in today's world - either to go their own way based on their roots and traditions, or to be drawn by the West into a never-ending spiral of decline, street violence, hatred of our own culture and history, economic domination of american and german corporations, and political domination of liberal extremists who will not stop until they impose their destructive agenda on all the nations of the world. I believe that in the end we will make the right decision and separate ourselves politically and culturally from Western Europe and North America, just as the Eastern Roman Empire once separated from the Western Roman Empire, which saved it from the decline and domination of the Germanics. Without foreign influence and dominance, the Slavs, Baltics, Finno-Ugrics, Dakoromans, and Caucasians will be able to start together a new cultural and power boom as an association of equal, sovereign and cooperating nations and reach as important position as more than thirty years ago, when (despite all the bad things that were happening here in that times) we directly controlled half of Europe and half of Asia and indirectly half of the world. If this happens depends on each of us, think about it especially during the elections in your countries...

üá¨üáß Turkish imperialism as a threat - today Syria, Iraq and Armenia, tomorrow Greece and the Slavic world...

The nations of central and eastern Europe have one thing in common, in addition to their ethnic and cultural affinity - almost every one of our states and nations has gone through a period of foreign domination during its history, which have fatally interfered our development, left deep scars on our souls and partially shape our present cultural identity. While the western Slavs and the Baltics had to face germanization and the german Drang nach Osten, the southern and eastern Slavs along with other nations (Hungarians, Romanians, Armenians, Georgians) experienced perhaps even more cruel turkish and tatar domination, during which millions of eastern european and Balkan men, women and children were killed or dragged into ottoman slavery. Despite great sacrifices and thanks to the enormous efforts of our ancestors, we finally managed to defeat german and turkish imperialism and gain freedom during the 19th and first half of the 20th century....

However, those who have watched the events of recent months carefully must have noticed that Turkey is once again becoming an aggressive imperialist state that that intends to conquer the eastern lands again. Northern Syria, Libya, the greek islands, Karabakh - Turkish hordes are marching there again to restore the empire, which was one of the cruelest in human history. And this is again happening with the support of the West, which is supplying them with weapons and supporting them economically. Unfortunately, this is nothing new, because when the southern Slavs fought for independence in the second half of the 19th, Germany and Great Britain sided with the Turks, whose bashibozooks killed civilians with british and german weapons.

Turkey's expansionist policy is one of the greatest geopolitical threats to the Slavic world today. President Erdogan and his suite of henchmen make it clear to everyone that they are serious and that they want to reverse the geopolitical situation in the region by military force. Anyone who watches the turkish political scene directly from turkish sources knows that their representatives do not hide their intentions at all and send a number of disturbing statements to the public space every day. The turkish minister of defense and one of the top generals of the NATO pact, Hulusi Akar, likes to place on his official accounts on social networks maps of Turkey including parts of Bulgaria, Macedonia, Greece, Armenia, Georgia, Cyprus, the russian Caucasus, Syria and Iraq; he openly threatens the surrounding nations and talks about a kind of turkic-ottoman project in which Turkey would gain dominance over all turkic nations, the middle east and the Balkans. President Erdogan publicly says his goal is Turkey, which territory beginning near Vienna and ending in western China, where turkic Uighurs live. And the West's response to Turkey's aggressive actions and declarations? None at all, they are still selling them weapons, trading with them and retreating to them. Erdogan thus slowly and surely subdues one state after another. He is now in Armenia and he is preparing conflict with Greece now, but it is already certain that he will soon turn his attention to the Slavic world, especially to Bulgaria, Macedonia, Bosnia and southern serbian Kosovo, maybe also to the russian Caucasus and the Volga region. It is not a question of whether this will happen, but when. Erdogan knows very well that we are weak, quarrelsome and disunited at the moment, and he will no doubt try to take advantage of that.

And how to face it all? Above all, the nations of central and eastern Europe must not repeat the same mistakes as in the middle ages, when they failed to identify the seriousness of the turkish danger and instead of making alliance together they fought each other and gradually the Turks occupied one state after another. Against a strong coalition of Turkey and its allies, we must, together with the Greeks, Armenians and Georgians, create a strong eastern coalition of Slavs, Baltics, Ugrofinns and Dacoromans. Together, we have the strength to beat Turkey in one week, but individually we are weak and vulnerable. Bulgaria itself, or perhaps Armenia itself, has no chance of defending itself against the turkish military-industrial colossus in the long run, but if we come together, we will be invincible. We will either finally realize this and arrange ourselves accordingly, or we will watch Erdogan triumph over Greece, Bulgaria, Macedonia and other states. The western states won‚Äôt help us, they will remain silent or they will support Turkey. I will do everything to ensure that the Ottomans never again enters the sacred ground of our nations, but in order for something to change, everyone who is aware of this danger must get involved. So let's go to the polls and choose the right candidates, let's agitate, convince, write articles. It is time to put an end to the era of the weakness and humiliation of the East after 30 years, which allowed Germany and Turkey to rise again at our expense; it is time for the East to become great, strong and feared again, because it is only way how to ensure freedom, security and stability for our nations in the globalized world...

üá¨üáß Today we have 17 th November and in the Czech republic we together commemorate the significant historical events in the history of our Homeland. Everything started in 1939, when apprentice and baker's  journeyman from √öst√≠ nad Labem V√°clav Sedl√°ƒçek was buried on 4th November and medicine student Jan Opletal from Lhota nad Moravou on the 15th November, both the victims of a violent suppression of demonstrations during the 20th anniversary of Czechoslovakia on 28th October by Germans. the students went to the streets to protest against the german occupiers, sang patriotic songs and called slogans about the freedom of our country. The german nazis dispersed all assemblies violently and used it as an pretext to launch repressive actions against czech students and czech nation at all. Czech universities were closed, leaders of students were arrested and 9 of them executed, more than a thousand czech students were taken to concentration camps. Based on these events 17th November was announced in November 1941 as the International day of students.

Let us take a moment now and remember the people, who were not afraid to defend our country in this dark time.
HONOR TO THESE HEROES! üá®üáøüá®üáø

üá¨üáß American elections and the Slavic world

Friends, dear Slavs, let me comment on a topic which now dominates the media space around the world - that topic is, of course, nothing less than american elections. I would like to start by statement that I do not consider the United States as such to be the center of the world, but it is still true fact that political events in America strongly influence events in Europe, both positively and negative.

Before I start analyzing the individual candidates and before I reveal why my sympathies belong to Donald Trump, I would like to summarize my position on contemporary America and especially on the contemporary american ruling elite. Personally, I am not primarily anti-american and I do not see only the bad things on the United States; after all, there are many proud and hardworking people and some of them are very similar to us Slavs in various aspects. I feel no animosity against them. However, I have a strong aversion to the american and in general western ruling class, which is a fused conglomerate of liberal politicians, the media, big business, and various activists; a conglomerate of mostly unscrupulous and not very moral people who do not hesitate to provoke a destructive wars under the pretext of protecting democracy and human rights and to impose on other nations of the world their value standards incompatible with the culture and historical development of these countries. Under the fight for human rights, freedom and democracy, they mostly hide their dirty trade practices and the desire to gain control over mineral or oil deposits and strategic areas for military bases. All this goes hand in hand with the export of globalism and liberalism, because the western elites don‚Äôt need a world made up of successful nations proud of their roots, but socially divided states economically dependent on western corporations and politically subordinate to the western liberal establishment. This doctrine has largely disintegrated the slavic and arab world, and now it is destroying the West itself from within. Burning cities, lynching crowds, tearing down statues, hatred of their own culture and history, inability to solve important problems, the impoverishment of the middle and working classes and the accumulation of world wealth in the hands of a few super rich - all this is an image of today's liberal democracy. As the decline of the social system in the West continues, their political and intellectual elites are more and more verbally attacking the states and nations of the East - we constantly hear sermons about elections in Poland, Hungary, Belarusia or Russia, they constantly lecture us what is true democracy, and we hear all the time awkward speeches about the alleged "danger of eastern and central european authoritarians." However, when we look at them in the West, we see a picture of a sick society teetering on the brink of serious internal conflict, and the current US elections are nothing more than a great example of how democratic elections should not look like. I do not dare to say now that there has been any fraud, but many circumstances have been very suspicious, and if elections were held in one of the countries of central and eastern Europe in this way, it would immediately become criticized by hypocritical western elites and their double standards...

And now back to Trump and Biden. As I mentioned above, I am more in favor of Donald Trump, although I must say that my support is rather lukewarm. Not one of the candidates is ideal for the slavic world, but Trump is the better of these two wrong options, mainly because he tries to confront the above-described forces of progresivists and globalists, which have a completely destructive effect on Europe and America. How much he has succeeded is a question, he has not fullfilled many promises and has disappointed in many ways, but from the point of view of central and eastern Europe, Trump is not the one who want to impose a liberal agenda on us and it is good poin≈•. His challenger Joe Biden is much more dangerous to us, as he is a figure of globalists representing, on the one hand, the interests of western corporations and, on the other hand, the interests of aggressive crowds plundering american and western european cities. From him we can expect to sharpen NATO's agenda, support to turkish expansion and support to german dominance within the EU, as well as increase pressure to impose liberal "values" on the nations of central and eastern Europe. While Trump within America represents those who, like us Slavs, are defeated of globalization, Biden represents the elites who make money and their social status on advancing globalization, regardless of the consequences.

Whatever the outcome of the election, it is certain that the time when the United States was the dominant world power is coming to an end. Instead, a multipolar world is emerging, dominated by pentarchy of great powers (Russia, USA, China, India, Brazil), whose influence will balance each other. It is positive news for the slavic world and at the same time an opportunity for us to regain lost positions after 30 years on the periphery. Within this goal, the isolationist and traditionalist Donald Trump suits us better than the liberal and globalist Biden...

üá¨üáß American elections and the Slavic world

Friends, dear Slavs, let me comment on a topic which now dominates the media space around the world - that topic is, of course, nothing less than american elections. I would like to start by statement that I do not consider the United States as such to be the center of the world, but it is still true fact that political events in America strongly influence events in Europe, both positively and negative.

Before I start analyzing the individual candidates and before I reveal why my sympathies belong to Donald Trump, I would like to summarize my position on contemporary America and especially on the contemporary american ruling elite. Personally, I am not primarily anti-american and I do not see only the bad things on the United States; after all, there are many proud and hardworking people and some of them are very similar to us Slavs in various aspects. I feel no animosity against them. However, I have a strong aversion to the american and in general western ruling class, which is a fused conglomerate of liberal politicians, the media, big business, and various activists; a conglomerate of mostly unscrupulous and not very moral people who do not hesitate to provoke a destructive wars under the pretext of protecting democracy and human rights and to impose on other nations of the world their value standards incompatible with the culture and historical development of these countries. Under the fight for human rights, freedom and democracy, they mostly hide their dirty trade practices and the desire to gain control over mineral or oil deposits and strategic areas for military bases. All this goes hand in hand with the export of globalism and liberalism, because the western elites don‚Äôt need a world made up of successful nations proud of their roots, but socially divided states economically dependent on western corporations and politically subordinate to the western liberal establishment. This doctrine has largely disintegrated the slavic and arab world, and now it is destroying the West itself from within. Burning cities, lynching crowds, tearing down statues, hatred of their own culture and history, inability to solve important problems, the impoverishment of the middle and working classes and the accumulation of world wealth in the hands of a few super rich - all this is an image of today's liberal democracy. As the decline of the social system in the West continues, their political and intellectual elites are more and more verbally attacking the states and nations of the East - we constantly hear sermons about elections in Poland, Hungary, Belarusia or Russia, they constantly lecture us what is true democracy, and we hear all the time awkward speeches about the alleged "danger of eastern and central european authoritarians." However, when we look at them in the West, we see a picture of a sick society teetering on the brink of serious internal conflict, and the current US elections are nothing more than a great example of how democratic elections should not look like. I do not dare to say now that there has been any fraud, but many circumstances have been very suspicious, and if elections were held in one of the countries of central and eastern Europe in this way, it would immediately become criticized by hypocritical western elites and their double standards...

And now back to Trump and Biden. As I mentioned above, I am more in favor of Donald Trump, although I must say that my support is rather lukewarm. Not one of the candidates is ideal for the slavic world, but Trump is the better of these two wrong options, mainly because he tries to confront the above-described forces of progresivists and globalists, which have a completely destructive effect on Europe and America. How much he has succeeded is a question, he has not fullfilled many promises and has disappointed in many ways, but from the point of view of central and eastern Europe, Trump is not the one who want to impose a liberal agenda on us and it is good poin≈•. His challenger Joe Biden is much more dangerous to us, as he is a figure of globalists representing, on the one hand, the interests of western corporations and, on the other hand, the interests of aggressive crowds plundering american and western european cities. From him we can expect to sharpen NATO's agenda, support to turkish expansion and support to german dominance within the EU, as well as increase pressure to impose liberal "values" on the nations of central and eastern Europe. While Trump within America represents those who, like us Slavs, are defeated of globalization, Biden represents the elites who make money and their social status on advancing globalization, regardless of the consequences.

Whatever the outcome of the election, it is certain that the time when the United States was the dominant world power is coming to an end. Instead, a multipolar world is emerging, dominated by pentarchy of great powers (Russia, USA, China, India, Brazil), whose influence will balance each other. It is positive news for the slavic world and at the same time an opportunity for us to regain lost positions after 30 years on the periphery. Within this goal, the isolationist and traditionalist Donald Trump suits us better than the liberal and globalist Biden...

üá¨üáß On this day we commemorate the anniversary of the event, which significantly influenced the development and direction of the Slavs in the 20th century. After the shots from the cruiser Aurora on 7th November 1917 broke out the Great October Socialist Revolution, which swept the interim government of Alexander Kerensky and instead established a government of Soviets with a dominant representation of the Bolsheviks. The subsequent course of history is known - first in Russia broke out the civil war, which ended in the victory of the Reds, then the USSR was created and eventually all culminated after World War II by establishing the Eastern bloc of socialist states, which included all slavic countries and nations, and which was one of the two strongest power blocs in the world...

üá¨üáß On these days (29th - 30th September) we remember the sad event in the history of Czechoslovakia....

Exactly 82 years ago a conference of representatives of nazi Germany (Adolf Hitler), fascist Italy (Benito Mussolini), France (Edouard Daladier) and Great Britain (Neville Chamberlain) were summoned to Munich to solve the so - called "Sudeten question" in the areas of the czechoslovakian border region. The conference was the culmination of the previous events of a century - old dispute between Czechs and the czech Germans, who came in the middle ages to the territory, which has always been ours, as guests at the invitation of the some czech kings, but as humble guests they behaved only sometimes and only some of them. With the establishment of Czechoslovakia a large number of them never reconciled, even though Czechoslovakia as one of the few countries with such a large german minority provided them with all the linguistic and national freedom. In the first CS republic there were thousands of german schools, german radio and the press and in the late twenties their ministers were in our government. But it was not enough for them. 

Since the beginning of the thirties in german - speaking areas began to spread nazi ideas and the result was anti - czech and anti - slavic moods spreaded mostly through the Sudeten german party, which resulted in several serious incidents, when czech families living in mostly german - speaking areas were attacked and lynched, the example is incident in little town Habartov. Czechoslovakia tried to reconcile with them, but the demands of the sudeten Germans led by the nazi Konrad Henlein (who paradoxically, despite their hatred towards the Czechs, was half Czech, because they had a czech mother) were stepping up. Nazi propaganda sent to the world false and fictional reports of alleged terror against the Germans in Czechoslovakia. The Western Powers, which were the guarantors of the establishment of our slavic state, gradually began to cling to the nazi side. In 1938 the situation was rampant  and Czechoslovakia was forced to mobilize, because of nazi military maneuvers. Germany was secretly sent to our territories members of SS, SA and Freikorps, who attacked and killed czech gendarmes and border guards. 

The Western Powers decided to send to Czechoslovakia Lord Runciman's mission to recognize, what is happening in the Czechoslovakia border areas. But he was totally incompetent and unilaterally focused, he was not interested in the situation and essentially his only activities were visits to the spectacles of sudeten german pronazi aristocrats. According to it his final report looked like. In September 1938 Hitler had at the NSDAP congress his fanatical speech full of hatred towards Czechoslovakia, which led to riots and several local uprisings in our border regions. In response to these events a conference of the aforementioned representatives was convened in Munich. The night of 29 and 30 September became the night of treachery. The Western powers, with whom we had allied treaties, to whom we looked up and in whom we hoped in our struggle for freedom and democracy, preyed us to the nazis and forced us to surrender our territory to Germany. On the following day the german military units, which was prepared before, came into the border region enthusiastically celebrated by a large part (not all) of sudeten Germans, who with the Wehrmacht, the SS and the Gestapo began to forcibly expel their czech neighbors. The victims also became german anti - fascists, who fled the from Germany because of nazis or the czech Germans, who were loyal to Czechoslovakia. There was also a refend, in which most Germans agreed to join Germany. So the dark epoch of our Homeland began, which was completed by the nazi occupation of our entire territory...

üá¨üáß Dear friends, I apologize for a little more political post, but I am upset and I need to comment...

I don't know if I'm the only one who feels things this way, but I'm tired of the contempt and arrogance that western leaders treat central and eastern Europe. I am tired of fact that we are good for them only as a source of billions euros in dividends that they earn from our countries through their corporates, I'm tired of our countries becoming a impoverished reservoir of cheap labor for western assembly plants, I'm tired of being a market for their inferior goods for twice the price, I am tired of the fact that western prosperity is built on the abusing of central and eastern european countries and finally I am absolutely upset that they despite it all do not respect our opinions, attitudes and values. Instead, they want to arrogantly dictate everything to us, they force us their self-destructive political whims, and they even want to punish us as naughty children if we want to resist. This is not only about migration and migration quotas, which they are constantly trying to enforce to us, but it is a complex issue that affects all economic, social and cultural aspects of central and eastern european life.

And I ask you all - how long do we let it be this way? We have already sold our industry to them, we are basically satellites with limited sovereignty in the EU, and now we will let them dictate us who should live in our countries? Seriously?

Either the countries of central and eastern Europe will finally stand up for their rights and interests, or we will simply bow our heads and obediently fulfill what Brussels and Berlin want from us. There are only these two options. They do not want a strong central and eastern Europe because they are afraid of us. They know well that the East, formed by cooperating strong national states, would be a threat to german-french hegemony, and that is why they are trying to bind us economically and politically. From the point of view of their interests, there is a certain cynical logic. Now it's on us how we approach it. I personally believe that the Slavs, Baltics, Ugrofinns, Dakoromans, Greeks and other peoples of central and eastern Europe should follow the example of the policy of hungarian prime minister Viktor Orb√°n. However, it is only my personal opinion which I do not force on anyone...

And what is your view on these topics? Am I alone in thinking about these issues, and am I alone, who is dissatisfied with the current position of central and eastern Europe? Or are there more of us? Write me in the comments what you think about it; I will also be happy for politely expressed dissenting opinions.

More about the new proposal of the European commission HERE üëâüèª https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-54249312

üá¨üáß Friends!
In these days we commemorate an important anniversary in the history of the slovakian nation and the whole Czechoslovakia, namely the 76th anniversary of the Slovakian national uprising üá∏üá∞üí™üèª‚úåüèª

It was an armed demonstration of anti - nazi and anti - fascist forces, which aimed to neutralize the german troops and open the carpathian route to Slovakia for the Red army. The illegally active Slovakian national council (formed in 1943 by joining various factions of the slovakian resistance) led discussions about subsequent events in the spring of 1944, and it was finally decided to follow the path of armed resistance. A similar scenario was also prepared by the exiled czechoslovakian government in London, which tried to negotiate british aid for a possible uprising, but they initially held back on this idea. The Soviet union eventually offered help from the beginning. After the outbreak of the uprising, however, supported it politically, militarily and materially also all the western powers.

The preparations were feverish for several months. It prepared slovakian resistance and partysans, from the Protectorate of Bohemia and Moravia came to support the planned uprising many Czechs. Numerous groups of soviet partysans were sent from Ukraine. The activity of the resistance fighters gradually increased, which was noticed by the Germans and the officials of the Tiso‚Äôs regime, and eventually led to a german demand for direct military occupation of Slovakia, which was approved by Jozef Tiso, and which began on 29th August 1944.

Initially, it was accompanied by some confusion in command, but even so the uprising spread rapidly, mostly in central Slovakia. In the territory under the control of the resistance fighters were established national committees, whose political structure was supported by the government in exile, and which also gained the support of all allied powers, ie Great Britain, the USSR and the USA. The Germans had a great advantage in armament and equipment, but the rebels fought bravely and achieved many successes. As one of them we can mention, for example, the battle of Telg√°rt, where they managed to push the Germans to retreat. For their support, the resistance fighters built three armored trains ≈†tef√°nik, Masaryk and Hurban and also created their own air force. However, it consisted of obsolete machines and against the german Luftwaffe in the fight it did not have much chance, and therefore was moved to Slovakia from the USSR 1st czechoslovakian air fighter regiment. The Western allies and the Soviet union supplied rebels with heavy weapons and American B-17 bombers bombed airports, hangars and workshops used by german troops. But even the Germans did not idle, brought to Slovakia heavy equipment and reinforcements, including fanatical SS units, which committed many massacres on the slovakian civilian population (see below). The brutal SS unit, composed of heavy criminals, led by the violent pedophile Oskar Dirlewanger, also joined the fighting.

On 19th October began a large german offensive, whose aim was also Bansk√° Bystrica, the center of the uprising. Rebels fought bravely, but eventually succumbed to german superiority in numbers and weapons. Bansk√° Bystrica was evacuated without a fight, and general Viest, who, along with general Goli√°n was one of the main commanders of the uprising, issued his last order on 28th October and recommended to the rebels withdraw to the mountains. Most of them obeyed this order and switched to guerrilla fighting. Many of them, however, were not materially prepared for it, and therefore many partysans died in the mountains of hunger, cold or exhaustion.

After the suppression of the Slovakian national uprising, the Germans and their domestic minions formed "death brigades", which unleashed terror against the slovakian civilian population, including women and children. More than 90 villages and settlements were burned down, more than 5,000 people were killed and about 211 mass graves of civilians were discovered after the war. Among the most shocking massacres were, for example, the massacre in Kremniƒçka (over 700 people were killed) or the massacre in the village Nemeck√°, where german sadists together with the participation of slovakian collaborators from Hlinka‚Äôs guards threw people into the red - hot kilns of local lime factory. Generals Goli√°n and Viest were arrested on 3rd November, dragged to Germany and then executed...

Although the rebellion eventually failed, it has become an important event, which we should not forget. An event, in which the slovakian people clearly opposed the german occupation and declared themselves to fight against the german plans to dominate Europe and to destroy the slavic world. And that is why we now remember all the brave slovakian patriots, who took part in the uprising and also all the innocent women, men and children, who were victims of the subsequent german rampage.

HONOR TO THEM AND MAY ALL OF THEM REST IN PEACE! üá∏üá∞
